data.lyric:
[ti:You Broke Up with Me]
[ar:Walker Hayes]
[al:You Broke Up with Me]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.34]You Broke Up with Me (你同我分手) - Walker Hayes
[00:01.83]
[00:03.03]Written by：Walker Hayes/Thomas Archer/Kylie Sackley
[00:04.62]
[00:18.04]Well I got some coke in my bourbon
[00:20.35]Surfin' the room like swazye
[00:21.76]
[00:22.28]No I ain't drunk I'm amazing
[00:23.62]
[00:25.08]Yeah I got that laid way way back back in my swagger
[00:29.13]Xfactor feeling no pain I'm at the top of my game
[00:32.60]
[00:33.34]Darlin' you can't crash my party with your sorry's and what are we's
[00:37.60]Don't start rainin' on my mardi gras parade for a minute
[00:41.03]
[00:41.60]I ain't even fixin' to listen to your guilt trippin'
[00:45.32]You're forgettin' girl you made your bed and didn't want me in it hey
[00:49.78]Woah girl simmer on down a notch
[00:53.23]Ain't nobody making you watch me get my forget you on
[00:57.68]No girl can't touch my good as gold
[01:00.52]
[01:01.04]I know it's difficult to see me on a roll
[01:04.59]
[01:05.64]But hey you broke up with me
[01:07.90]
[01:09.05]Yeah what can I say babe you broke up with me
[01:12.21]
[01:21.44]Ha
[01:22.16]Guess you don't know what you want
[01:23.75]
[01:24.35]'Til you see I'm movin' on
[01:25.68]
[01:26.27]Makin' lonely look like freedom
[01:28.51]Baby don't even act like I'm doing something wrong
[01:31.68]If my song comes on and I get lost on that dance floor
[01:35.83]In somebody's arms that aren't yours
[01:37.83]You can't crash my party with your sorry's and what are we's
[01:41.75]Don't start rainin' on my mardi gras parade for a minute
[01:45.97]I ain't even fixin' to listen to your guilt trippin'
[01:49.38]You're forgettin' girl you made your bed and didn't want me in it hey
[01:54.23]Woah girl simmer on down a notch
[01:56.51]
[01:57.23]Ain't nobody making you watch me get my forget you on
[02:01.67]No girl can't touch my good as gold
[02:04.46]
[02:05.08]I know it's difficult to see me on a roll hey
[02:09.79]But hey you broke up with me
[02:11.87]
[02:13.13]Yeah what can I say babe you broke up with me
[02:16.09]
[02:17.95]For real babe ain't tryin' rub it your face
[02:20.70]
[02:21.63]I'm just breaking off a little cold hard truth
[02:23.88]
[02:25.29]It is what it is girl you did what you did girl
[02:28.39]
[02:29.17]I'm just doin' what a bachelor do
[02:31.63]
[02:33.45]Darlin' you can't crash my party with your sorry's and what are we's
[02:37.55]Don't start rainin' on my mardi gras parade for a minute quit it
[02:41.89]I ain't even fixin' to listen to your guilt trippin'
[02:45.36]You're forgettin' girl you made your bed and didn't want me in it hey
[02:50.17]Woah girl simmer on down a notch
[02:52.53]
[02:53.27]Ain't nobody making you watch me get my forget you on
[02:57.64]No girl can't touch my good as gold
[03:00.34]
[03:01.07]I know it's difficult to see me on a roll
[03:04.44]
[03:05.79]But hey you broke up with me
[03:07.80]
[03:09.15]Yeah what can I say babe you broke up with me
data.trans:
[ti:You Broke Up with Me]
[ar:Walker Hayes]
[al:You Broke Up with Me]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.34]//
[00:01.83]
[00:03.03]//
[00:04.62]
[00:18.04]我在波旁威士忌中加了一些可乐
[00:20.35]像Swazye那样 在房间中踱步
[00:21.76]
[00:22.28]不 我并没有喝醉 我只是觉得不可思议
[00:23.62]
[00:25.08]是的 我又想起了 想起了我们的从前
[00:29.13]没有什么未知因素 也没有不快 我掌控着这场游戏
[00:32.60]
[00:33.34]亲爱的 你的道歉 并不会毁了我的派对 我们之间算什么呢
[00:37.60]可不要在我的狂欢节上掉眼泪
[00:41.03]
[00:41.60]我甚至不愿听你那可笑的忏悔
[00:45.32]你忘了吗 女孩 你曾铺好了床 却不让我进你的房间
[00:49.78]女孩 你可知滴水成河 我已死心
[00:53.23]没有人强迫你来看我 我已经忘记你了
[00:57.68]女孩 你不能再爱抚我了
[01:00.52]
[01:01.04]我知道 或许你很难再见到我大展身手
[01:04.59]
[01:05.64]但是 是你先提分手的
[01:07.90]
[01:09.05]我还能说什么呢 宝贝 是你跟我分手的
[01:12.21]
[01:21.44]//
[01:22.16]我想 你也不知道自己到底想要什么
[01:23.75]
[01:24.35]直到你看见我早已释怀 继续前行
[01:25.68]
[01:26.27]把这份孤单变成洒脱
[01:28.51]宝贝 不要表现得好像是我做错了什么
[01:31.68]继续引吭高歌 我就要迷失在这舞池之中
[01:35.83]我在他人的怀抱 而不是你的怀抱
[01:37.83]亲爱的 你的道歉 并不会毁了我的派对 我们之间算什么呢
[01:41.75]可不要在我的狂欢节上掉眼泪
[01:45.97]我甚至不愿听你那可笑的忏悔
[01:49.38]你忘了吗 女孩 你曾铺好了床 却不让我进你的房间
[01:54.23]女孩 我已渐渐对你死心
[01:56.51]
[01:57.23]没有人强迫你来看我 我已经忘记你了
[02:01.67]女孩 你不能再爱抚我了
[02:04.46]
[02:05.08]我知道 或许你很难再见到我大展身手
[02:09.79]但是 是你先提分手的
[02:11.87]
[02:13.13]我还能说什么呢 宝贝 是你跟我分手的
[02:16.09]
[02:17.95]说真的 宝贝 我无需费力就已忘记你的容颜
[02:20.70]
[02:21.63]我只是忽然知道了一点残酷的真相
[02:23.88]
[02:25.29]事实无法更改 女孩 你做了你要做的 女孩
[02:28.39]
[02:29.17]我现在也只是在做单身汉应该做的事情
[02:31.63]
[02:33.45]亲爱的 你的道歉 并不会毁了我的派对 我们之间算什么呢
[02:37.55]可不要在我的狂欢节上掉眼泪 别哭了
[02:41.89]我甚至不愿听你那可笑的忏悔
[02:45.36]你忘了吗 女孩 你曾铺好了床 却不让我进你的房间
[02:50.17]女孩 我已渐渐对你死心
[02:52.53]
[02:53.27]没有人强迫你来看我 我已经忘记你了
[02:57.64]女孩 你不能再爱抚我了
[03:00.34]
[03:01.07]我知道 或许你很难再见到我大展身手
[03:04.44]
[03:05.79]但是 是你先提分手的
[03:07.80]
[03:09.15]我还能说什么呢 宝贝 是你跟我分手的
